title: Dark Waters (restored, colorized) (1944, film-noir, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: Dark Waters Colorized Movie 720p
sources.description: Dark Waters is a 1944 American Gothic film noir based on the novel of the same name by Francis and Marian Cockrell. It was directed by Andre de Toth and starred Merle Oberon , Franchot Tone , and Thomas Mitchell .
